snippet.title: Nintendo Switch/Steam software “THOSE GAMES” Latest promotional video for Switch version released!
snippet.description:
Play "that game" that everyone has always wanted to play, easily! Includes 250 mini-game stages!

「YEAH! YOU WANT "THOSE GAMES," RIGHT? SO HERE YOU GO! NOW, LET'S SEE YOU CLEAR THEM!」
Commonly known as "that game"....
This is a collection of mini-games that everyone has wanted to try, created with comical and cute stick figures, and can be played plenty, slowly, and as much as you want.
The number of games in the collection is 250 stages!

■Official Website
https://www.d3p.co.jp/anoge

【Outline of the product】
　Title: YEAH! YOU WANT "THOSE GAMES," RIGHT? SO HERE YOU GO! NOW, LET'S SEE YOU CLEAR THEM!
　Release date: July 20, 2023
　Compatibility: Nintendo Switch/Steam 
　Genre: Mini-game collection
　Player: 1 player
　Language: Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
　Rating: E 10+
　Rights: ©2023 D3PUBLISHER
